message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-value asset at a discounted rate. I look forward to hearing your response soon. Kind regards, Alice
